Script.name: MedBootstrap
Script.script:
local meduiPackage = "MedUI"
-- function to install or update your MUD package local function installServerPackage() local installedVersion = mpkg.getInstalledVersion(meduiPackage) local repoVersion = mpkg.getRepositoryVersion(meduiPackage)
if not installedVersion then mpkg.install(meduiPackage) return end
if semver(installedVersion) < semver(repoVersion) then mpkg.upgrade(meduiPackage) end end
-- install mpkg if not already local mpkgVersion = getPackageInfo("mpkg", "version")
if mpkgVersion == "" then installPackage("https://mudlet.github.io/mudlet-package-repository/packages/mpkg.mpackage") -- wait a few seconds until mpkg is installed then check MUD package tempTimer(5, function() installServerPackage() end) else installServerPackage() end
